document_data.name: Dire tiger
document_data.mainbody:
'''Dire tigers '''were a monstrous variety of the mundane species of [[Feline]] known as [[tiger]]s.

{{quote|''This immense, monstrous feline is almost as tall at the shoulder as a human. It has a long body with bold stripes and paws the size of bucklers.''}}
document_data.Description: Dire tigers were giant cats with a pair of huge {{SI|6|in|c}} fangs jutting from their powerful jaws. They grew to be over {{SI|12|ft}} long and could weigh up to {{SI|6000|lb|k}}.
document_data.Combat: Dire tigers preyed on just about anything that moved, patiently stalking a potential meal, and striking whenever the creature let down its guard. A dire tiger attacked by running at prey, leaping, and clawing and biting as it raked with its rear claws.

Ecology.Habitat: Dire tigers were found in warm forests. They are known to live the [[Dunwood]].. They also lived in the [[Cat Lord's Prowl]].
Ecology.Relationships: The [[demon lord]] [[Baphomet]] was known to sometimes have [[awaken]]ed dire tigers serving him.{{Cite dragon/341/Demonomicon of Iggwilv: Baphomet: Prince of Beasts|27}}

document_data.Notable Dire Tigers: * [[Rajah]], a dire tiger that was raised by [[Nar'shindah Sugimar]].{{Cite dungeon/127/Vampires of Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Crypt}}
